thread.title: Middlesbrough transfer news: David Nugent set to join Derby instead of Jordan Rhodes in £3million deal
thread.title_full: Middlesbrough transfer news: David Nugent set to join Derby instead of Jordan Rhodes in £3million deal

author: achapman
title: Middlesbrough transfer news: David Nugent set to join Derby instead of Jordan Rhodes in £3million deal
text:
Trading Places Middlesbrough transfer news: David Nugent set to join Derby instead of Jordan Rhodes in £3million deal 
Steve McClaren changes target after being priced out of move for Aston Villa and Sheffield Wednesday hopeful Rhodes Exclusive Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window) Comments MIDDLESBROUGH are letting striker David Nugent join ambitious Derby County in a deal worth up to £3 million. 
Nugent has lost his place in Aitor Karanka’s side and will be allowed to move and pick up a big contract with the Rams. Reuters David Nugent is set to join Derby in a £3m deal from Middlesbrough 
Steve McClaren moved for Nugent after being priced out of a deal for strike partner Jordan Rhodes. Keep up to date with ALL the Middlesbrough news, gossip, transfers and goals on our club page plus fixtures, results and live match commentary 
Nugent will give Derby more firepower as they have struggled in that area his season despite an impressive winning run. 
The deal still leaves Rhodes available but his £12 million valuation is putting off Aston Villa and Sheffield Wednesday. Reuters Derby initially tried to sign Boro striker Jordan Rhodes Middlesbrough 0 Leicester 0: Chances missed by both teams at Riverside Stadium AP:Associated Press 5 Aitor Karanka pounced to sign Rudy Gestede from Aston Villa 
There’s been a fair bit of activity at the Riverside already this month, with Rudy Gestede arriving in a £6m move from Aston Villa. 
Rhodes could yet leave while Julien de Sart has already joined the Rams on loan. Keep up-to-date with all the latest transfer news and gossip ahead of the January window with SunSport's daily LIVE blog Related Stories Mark Hughes determined to keep ex-Barca star Bojan Krkic at Stoke amid Boro's mounting interest STILL BROWSING Aitor Karanka reveals intention to bring a winger to Middlesbrough before the end of the month 'Tempted to work in an office' Boro's record signing Marten de Roon reveals he dreams of being an ACCOUNTANT DAN THE MAN Galatasaray to test Middlesbrough's resolve with £8.5m bid for out-of-favour defender Daniel Ayala Getty Images Daniel Ayala is a target for Galatasaray Getty Images Everton are believed to be looking at Ben Gibson 
Karanka is sure to be concerned by interest from Galatasaray in Daniel Ayala. 
While Ben Gibson is a target for Everton after they dropped out of the running for Southampton’s Virgil van Dijk.
